sentences.en: All dumping of sludge will be banned by 1998.
sentences.cn: 从1998年起，将禁止所有倾倒淤泥的行为。

sentences.en: Fluid sludge can be sold to farmers for spreading on their fields.
sentences.cn: 液态污泥可以出售给农民,洒布在农田里.

sentences.en: In practice this is not the case since part of the sludge is not biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 实际上不是这样,因为有一部分污泥不能为生物所降鲜.

sentences.en: Iron and aluminum compounds precipitate as a voluminous sludge.
sentences.cn: 铁和铝的化合物成为一种体积庞大的蓬松的游渣沉淀下来.

sentences.en: It improves digester cost operation and reduces capital cost wherever sludge digestion is utilized.
sentences.cn: 当采用污泥消化时,它可改进消化器的运行并降低其基建投资费用.

sentences.en: More data is needed to substantiate the effectiveness of adsorption on sludge as a removal process.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的资料来论证污泥吸附作为去除方法的效能.

sentences.en: More than a million gallons of sludge has seeped into the water.
sentences.cn: 超过一百万加仑的工业废料已渗进水中。

sentences.en: Most of the cellulose will settle to produce a sludge.
sentences.cn: 大部分纤维素沉淀生成污泥.

sentences.en: Over 300 strains of bacteria have been found in activated sludge.
sentences.cn: 活性污泥中发现有300种以上的细菌.

sentences.en: Segregation of fatty material is a serious problem in anaerobic sludge digestion units.
sentences.cn: 厌氧污泥消化单元中脂肪物质的分离是个难题.

sentences.en: Sludge can also clog oil passages and prevent normal engine lubrication.
sentences.cn: 油泥还会阻塞油路,妨碍发动机的正常润滑工作.

sentences.en: Sludge incineration is a frequently employed disposed method.
sentences.cn: 污泥焚烧也是一种常用的处置方法.

sentences.en: The gas contains blow - by, sludge, acids, oil, and other contaminant.
sentences.cn: 这些气体包括窜缸气体, 沉积物, 酸, 机油和其它杂质的气体.

sentences.en: The trickling filter and activated sludge efficiencies cited required primary sedimentation and effluent circulation.
sentences.cn: 列举的生物滤池与活性淤泥法的效率就需要初次沉淀和回流.

sentences.en: Theoretically sludge yield is nil for the extended aeration process.
sentences.cn: 对延时曝气法而言,理论上污泥生成量应为零.

sentences.en: There was some sludge at the bottom of the tank.

words.tran_cn: [环境]烂泥；泥泞；泥状雪；沉淀物；（海上）小浮冰

phrases.tran_cn: 活性污泥（废水处理方法的一种）
消化污泥；菌致分解污泥
原污泥；生污泥；未经处理污泥
n. 污水污泥；下水污泥
污泥增浓器；污泥浓缩池

trans.tran_cn: 泥浆，烂泥，沉淀物，泥状雪
trans.tran_en: soft thick mud, especially at the bottom of a liquid
